panel.field: This patch allows you to modify the Balrog (Shoot) Entity.

panel.title: Balrog (Shoot) bullet parameters:
panel.field: *The higher the value, the slower Balrog shoots his shots.
Changing this parameter will change what Balrog shoots out from his mouth.
Value 2 makes Balrog stand in place and endlessly shoot his mouth shots.
**Other variables have NOT BEEN TESTED! Be careful if you experiment!

panel.title: Balrog (Shoot) Jump Attributes
panel.field: *The higher the value, the lower Balrog jumps.
*The higher the value, the longer Balrog rests.
